# Footer Component Usage Guide

## Latest Features (v1.0.66+)

The Footer component is a comprehensive, industry-standard footer solution that provides complete footer functionality for web applications. It includes theme support, compound structure, responsive design, and flexible composition patterns.

### ðŸŽ¨ v1.0.66 Complete Footer System Implementation
- **5 Theme Variants**: `default`, `brand`, `minimal`, `grey`, `dark`, `custom`
- **Smart Logo Integration**: Theme-aware logo switching with proper light/dark mode handling
- **Compound Structure**: Modular sub-components for maximum flexibility
- **Performance Optimized**: Event-based theme updates and memoized calculations
- **Industry Standards**: Newsletter signup, social media, contact info, copyright, multi-column layouts

## Quick Start

```tsx
import { Footer } from '@acutrack-bookprint/acutrack-ds';

// Basic Footer
<Footer>
  <Footer.Container>
    <div className="text-center">
      <Footer.Copyright company="My Company" />
    </div>
  </Footer.Container>
</Footer>

// Extended Footer with Theme
<Footer theme="brand" variant="extended">
  <Footer.Container>
    <div className="grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-4 gap-8">
      <Footer.Brand text="Acutrack" />
      <Footer.Section title="Quick Links">
        <Footer.Links links={links} />
      </Footer.Section>
      <Footer.Section title="Contact">
        <Footer.Contact email="hello@acutrack.com" />
      </Footer.Section>
      <Footer.Newsletter />
    </div>
    <div className="mt-8 pt-8 border-t">
      <Footer.Copyright />
      <Footer.Social socialLinks={socialLinks} />
    </div>
  </Footer.Container>
</Footer>
```

## Component Overview

The Footer component uses a compound pattern with multiple sub-components:

- **`Footer`** - Root component with theme and layout control
- **`Footer.Container`** - Responsive container wrapper
- **`Footer.Section`** - Content sections with optional titles
- **`Footer.Brand`** - Logo and company branding
- **`Footer.Links`** - Navigation links with grid layout
- **`Footer.Social`** - Social media links
- **`Footer.Contact`** - Contact information
- **`Footer.Newsletter`** - Email subscription form
- **`Footer.Copyright`** - Copyright text with year and company

## Basic Usage

### Simple Footer
```tsx
<Footer>
  <Footer.Container>
    <div className="text-center">
      <Footer.Copyright company="My Company" year={2025} />
    </div>
  </Footer.Container>
</Footer>
```

### Footer with Brand
```tsx
<Footer theme="default">
  <Footer.Container>
    <div className="flex justify-between items-center">
      <Footer.Brand text="My Company" />
      <Footer.Copyright company="My Company" />
    </div>
  </Footer.Container>
</Footer>
```

### Footer with Links
```tsx
<Footer>
  <Footer.Container>
    <div className="grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-3 gap-8">
      <Footer.Section title="Company">
        <Footer.Links links={[
          { label: 'About Us', href: '/about' },
          { label: 'Contact', href: '/contact' },
          { label: 'Careers', href: '/careers' }
        ]} />
      </Footer.Section>
      <Footer.Section title="Support">
        <Footer.Links links={[
          { label: 'Help Center', href: '/help' },
          { label: 'Documentation', href: '/docs' },
          { label: 'Status', href: '/status' }
        ]} />
      </Footer.Section>
      <Footer.Section title="Legal">
        <Footer.Links links={[
          { label: 'Privacy Policy', href: '/privacy' },
          { label: 'Terms of Service', href: '/terms' }
        ]} />
      </Footer.Section>
    </div>
    <div className="mt-8 pt-8 border-t text-center">
      <Footer.Copyright company="My Company" />
    </div>
  </Footer.Container>
</Footer>
```

## Advanced Features

### Sticky Footer
```tsx
<Footer sticky>
  <Footer.Container>
    <Footer.Copyright company="My Company" />
  </Footer.Container>
</Footer>
```

### Custom Sizes
```tsx
<Footer size="lg" variant="extended">
  <Footer.Container>
    {/* Large footer content */}
  </Footer.Container>
</Footer>
```

### Custom Colors
```tsx
<Footer 
  theme="custom"
  customColors={{
    backgroundColor: '#1a1a1a',
    textColor: '#ffffff',
    textSecondaryColor: '#cccccc',
    hoverColor: '#ff6b35',
    activeColor: '#ff6b35',
    borderColor: '#333333',
    logoColor: '#ffffff',
    linkColor: '#cccccc',
    socialColor: '#cccccc',
    copyrightColor: '#999999'
  }}
>
  <Footer.Container>
    <Footer.Copyright company="My Company" />
  </Footer.Container>
</Footer>
```

## Theme System

The Footer component supports 5 built-in themes and custom colors:

### Built-in Themes

#### Default Theme
```tsx
<Footer theme="default">
  {/* Uses design system colors with dark mode support */}
</Footer>
```

#### Brand Theme
```tsx
<Footer theme="brand">
  {/* Navy background with orange accents */}
</Footer>
```

#### Minimal Theme
```tsx
<Footer theme="minimal">
  {/* Clean white background */}
</Footer>
```

#### Grey Theme
```tsx
<Footer theme="grey">
  {/* Dark grey background */}
</Footer>
```

#### Dark Theme
```tsx
<Footer theme="dark">
  {/* System dark colors */}
</Footer>
```

### Theme-Aware Logo Integration
```tsx
// Default theme - logo changes with light/dark mode
<Footer theme="default">
  <Footer.Brand text="Dynamic Logo" /> {/* Changes with dark mode toggle */}
</Footer>

// Brand theme - fixed dark logo
<Footer theme="brand">
  <Footer.Brand text="Brand Logo" /> {/* Always dark logo */}
</Footer>

// Minimal theme - fixed grey light logo
<Footer theme="minimal">
  <Footer.Brand text="Minimal Logo" /> {/* Always grey light logo */}
</Footer>
```

## Sub-Components

### Footer.Container
Responsive container wrapper with proper padding and max-width.

```tsx
<Footer.Container>
  {/* Footer content */}
</Footer.Container>
```

### Footer.Section
Content sections with optional titles.

```tsx
<Footer.Section title="Quick Links">
  <Footer.Links links={links} />
</Footer.Section>

<Footer.Section>
  {/* Section without title */}
</Footer.Section>
```

### Footer.Brand
Logo and company branding with smart theme-aware logo switching.

```tsx
<Footer.Brand text="My Company" />
<Footer.Brand text="My Company" href="/" isClickable />
<Footer.Brand /> {/* Logo only, no text */}
```

### Footer.Links
Navigation links with grid layout support.

```tsx
<Footer.Links 
  links={[
    { label: 'Home', href: '/' },
    { label: 'About', href: '/about' },
    { label: 'Contact', href: '/contact', external: true }
  ]} 
  columns={2} 
/>
```

### Footer.Social
Social media links with icons.

```tsx
<Footer.Social socialLinks={[
  { name: 'Facebook', href: 'https://facebook.com', icon: 'ðŸ“˜' },
  { name: 'Twitter', href: 'https://twitter.com', icon: 'ðŸ¦' },
  { name: 'LinkedIn', href: 'https://linkedin.com', icon: 'ðŸ’¼' }
]} />
```

### Footer.Contact
Contact information display.

```tsx
<Footer.Contact
  email="hello@company.com"
  phone="+1 (555) 123-4567"
  address="123 Main St, City, State 12345"
/>
```

### Footer.Newsletter
Email subscription form.

```tsx
<Footer.Newsletter
  title="Stay Updated"
  placeholder="Enter your email"
  buttonText="Subscribe"
  onSubmit={(email) => console.log('Subscribed:', email)}
/>
```

### Footer.Copyright
Copyright text with year and company.

```tsx
<Footer.Copyright company="My Company" year={2025} />
<Footer.Copyright text="Â© 2025 My Company. All rights reserved." />
```

## Responsive Design

The Footer component is fully responsive and adapts to different screen sizes:

```tsx
<Footer>
  <Footer.Container>
    <div className="grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-4 gap-8">
      {/* Responsive grid layout */}
    </div>
  </Footer.Container>
</Footer>
```

### Mobile Considerations
- Links stack vertically on mobile
- Social icons remain horizontal
- Newsletter form adapts to full width
- Contact info remains readable

## Customization

### Custom Styling
```tsx
<Footer className="custom-footer-class">
  <Footer.Container className="custom-container">
    <Footer.Section className="custom-section">
      {/* Custom content */}
    </Footer.Section>
  </Footer.Container>
</Footer>
```

### Custom Layout
```tsx
<Footer>
  <Footer.Container>
    <div className="flex flex-col lg:flex-row justify-between items-center">
      <Footer.Brand text="My Company" />
      <div className="flex space-x-6 mt-4 lg:mt-0">
        <Footer.Links links={links} />
        <Footer.Social socialLinks={socialLinks} />
      </div>
    </div>
  </Footer.Container>
</Footer>
```

### Conditional Rendering
```tsx
<Footer>
  <Footer.Container>
    <div className="grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-3 gap-8">
      {showBrand && (
        <Footer.Section>
          <Footer.Brand text="My Company" />
        </Footer.Section>
      )}
      {showLinks && (
        <Footer.Section title="Links">
          <Footer.Links links={links} />
        </Footer.Section>
      )}
      {showContact && (
        <Footer.Section title="Contact">
          <Footer.Contact email="hello@company.com" />
        </Footer.Section>
      )}
    </div>
  </Footer.Container>
</Footer>
```

## Accessibility

The Footer component follows WCAG 2.1 guidelines:

### Semantic HTML
- Uses proper `<footer>` element
- Semantic heading structure
- Proper link attributes

### Keyboard Navigation
- All interactive elements are keyboard accessible
- Proper tab order
- Focus indicators

### Screen Reader Support
- Proper ARIA labels
- Semantic structure
- Descriptive link text

### Color Contrast
- Meets WCAG 2.1 AA contrast requirements
- Theme-aware color selection
- High contrast focus states

## Best Practices

### Content Organization
1. **Group Related Links**: Organize links into logical sections
2. **Use Clear Labels**: Use descriptive section titles and link labels
3. **Limit Link Count**: Keep each section to 5-7 links maximum
4. **Prioritize Content**: Place most important content first

### Performance
1. **Lazy Load Social Icons**: Load social media icons only when needed
2. **Optimize Images**: Use appropriate logo sizes
3. **Minimize Re-renders**: Use stable references for links and data

### SEO
1. **Use Proper Links**: Include relevant internal and external links
2. **Structured Data**: Consider adding structured data for contact info
3. **Sitemap Links**: Include links to important pages

### Mobile Experience
1. **Touch-Friendly**: Ensure links are large enough for touch
2. **Readable Text**: Use appropriate font sizes
3. **Fast Loading**: Optimize for mobile performance

## Migration Guide

### From Basic Footer
If you were using the basic Footer from Layout.tsx:

```tsx
// Old
<Footer hasBackground hasElevation>
  <Container size="screen" padding="lg">
    <div className="text-center">
      <p>Â© 2024 My Company. All rights reserved.</p>
    </div>
  </Container>
</Footer>

// New
<Footer theme="default" variant="extended">
  <Footer.Container>
    <div className="text-center">
      <Footer.Copyright company="My Company" year={2024} />
    </div>
  </Footer.Container>
</Footer>
```

### Adding Theme Support
```tsx
// Add theme to existing footer
<Footer theme="brand" variant="extended">
  {/* Existing content */}
</Footer>
```

## Troubleshooting

### Common Issues

#### Logo Not Changing with Theme
```tsx
// Ensure you're using Footer.Brand correctly
<Footer.Brand text="My Company" /> {/* Correct */}
<Footer.Brand>My Company</Footer.Brand> {/* Incorrect */}
```

#### Links Not Styling Correctly
```tsx
// Ensure links array has correct structure
<Footer.Links links={[
  { label: 'Home', href: '/' }, // Correct
  { label: 'About', href: '/about', external: true } // Correct
]} />
```

#### Theme Colors Not Applying
```tsx
// Check if custom colors are properly formatted
<Footer 
  theme="custom"
  customColors={{
    backgroundColor: 'rgb(26, 26, 26)', // Use RGB format
    textColor: 'rgb(255, 255, 255)',
    // ... other colors
  }}
>
```

#### Responsive Issues
```tsx
// Use proper responsive classes
<div className="grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-4 gap-8">
  {/* Content */}
</div>
```

### Performance Issues

#### Slow Re-renders
- Use stable references for links and social data
- Memoize expensive calculations
- Avoid inline object creation

#### Large Bundle Size
- Import only needed components
- Use tree shaking
- Consider code splitting for large footers

## API Reference

### Footer Props
```tsx
interface FooterProps {
  variant?: 'default' | 'minimal' | 'extended' | 'landing' | 'dashboard';
  size?: 'sm' | 'md' | 'lg' | 'xl';
  theme?: 'default' | 'brand' | 'minimal' | 'grey' | 'dark' | 'custom';
  customColors?: FooterCustomColors;
  sticky?: boolean;
  className?: string;
  children: React.ReactNode;
}
```

### FooterCustomColors
```tsx
interface FooterCustomColors {
  backgroundColor?: string;
  textColor?: string;
  textSecondaryColor?: string;
  hoverColor?: string;
  activeColor?: string;
  borderColor?: string;
  logoColor?: string;
  linkColor?: string;
  socialColor?: string;
  copyrightColor?: string;
}
```

### Sub-Component Props
```tsx
// Footer.Brand
interface FooterBrandProps {
  text?: string;
  href?: string;
  isClickable?: boolean;
  className?: string;
}

// Footer.Links
interface FooterLinksProps {
  links: Array<{
    label: string;
    href: string;
    external?: boolean;
  }>;
  columns?: number;
  className?: string;
}

// Footer.Social
interface FooterSocialProps {
  socialLinks: Array<{
    name: string;
    href: string;
    icon: string;
  }>;
  className?: string;
}

// Footer.Contact
interface FooterContactProps {
  email?: string;
  phone?: string;
  address?: string;
  className?: string;
}

// Footer.Newsletter
interface FooterNewsletterProps {
  title?: string;
  placeholder?: string;
  buttonText?: string;
  onSubmit?: (email: string) => void;
  className?: string;
}

// Footer.Copyright
interface FooterCopyrightProps {
  text?: string;
  year?: number;
  company?: string;
  className?: string;
}
```

## Examples

### E-commerce Footer
```tsx
<Footer theme="brand" variant="extended">
  <Footer.Container>
    <div className="grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-4 gap-8">
      <Footer.Section>
        <Footer.Brand text="ShopName" />
        <p className="mt-4 text-sm">
          Your one-stop shop for quality products.
        </p>
        <Footer.Social socialLinks={socialLinks} />
      </Footer.Section>
      
      <Footer.Section title="Shop">
        <Footer.Links links={[
          { label: 'All Products', href: '/products' },
          { label: 'New Arrivals', href: '/new' },
          { label: 'Best Sellers', href: '/bestsellers' },
          { label: 'Sale', href: '/sale' }
        ]} />
      </Footer.Section>
      
      <Footer.Section title="Customer Service">
        <Footer.Links links={[
          { label: 'Help Center', href: '/help' },
          { label: 'Shipping Info', href: '/shipping' },
          { label: 'Returns', href: '/returns' },
          { label: 'Size Guide', href: '/sizing' }
        ]} />
      </Footer.Section>
      
      <Footer.Section title="Stay Connected">
        <Footer.Newsletter 
          title="Newsletter"
          placeholder="Enter your email"
          buttonText="Subscribe"
          onSubmit={handleNewsletter}
        />
        <Footer.Contact 
          email="support@shopname.com"
          phone="1-800-SHOP-NOW"
        />
      </Footer.Section>
    </div>
    
    <div className="mt-12 pt-8 border-t">
      <div className="flex flex-col md:flex-row justify-between items-center">
        <Footer.Copyright company="ShopName" year={2025} />
        <div className="flex space-x-6 mt-4 md:mt-0">
          <a href="/privacy" className="text-sm hover:text-brand-orange">Privacy</a>
          <a href="/terms" className="text-sm hover:text-brand-orange">Terms</a>
          <a href="/cookies" className="text-sm hover:text-brand-orange">Cookies</a>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
  </Footer.Container>
</Footer>
```

### Corporate Footer
```tsx
<Footer theme="minimal" variant="extended">
  <Footer.Container>
    <div className="grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-3 gap-8">
      <Footer.Section>
        <Footer.Brand text="CompanyName" />
        <p className="mt-4 text-sm">
          Leading the industry with innovative solutions and exceptional service.
        </p>
      </Footer.Section>
      
      <Footer.Section title="Company">
        <Footer.Links links={[
          { label: 'About Us', href: '/about' },
          { label: 'Our Team', href: '/team' },
          { label: 'Careers', href: '/careers' },
          { label: 'Press', href: '/press' }
        ]} />
      </Footer.Section>
      
      <Footer.Section title="Contact">
        <Footer.Contact
          email="info@company.com"
          phone="+1 (555) 123-4567"
          address="123 Business Ave, Suite 100, City, State 12345"
        />
      </Footer.Section>
    </div>
    
    <div className="mt-8 pt-8 border-t text-center">
      <Footer.Copyright company="CompanyName" year={2025} />
    </div>
  </Footer.Container>
</Footer>
```

### Blog Footer
```tsx
<Footer theme="default" variant="minimal">
  <Footer.Container>
    <div className="flex flex-col md:flex-row justify-between items-center">
      <Footer.Brand text="BlogName" />

    </div>

</Footer>
```
